name: Escape from Mothman Asylum
description:
USSR year 1986 a secret government experiment related to the paranormal has gone very wrong and has attracted the attention of a creature from another dimension that they call "Mothman" because the light attracts him.

You have been "chosen" to return to the laboratory and expel it but it won't be easy because the weapons don't affect him the only way is to restore the light. Although the light attracts him, he also hates it and that is why he pursues any hint of light to turn it off. 

You must access all the fuses and activate them, although for this you must solve some puzzles that the scientists left before fleeing or ... disappearing.
Your character is human and is affected by fear, darkness and paranormal events could drive him crazy ... being near the light will keep you sane!

Features:

-Nice adjustable realistic graphics
-Progress saving system so you don't have to start your game from 0 :) 
-Terrifying scenarios
-The simply epic Mothman

Controls:

Move: W,A,S,D

Rotate Camera: Mouse

Pick objects / Open doors/ Interact : Left mouse button

Hide/ Show cursor :  Right mouse button

Show Info: Info Screen Button / Esc

Show Menu: Menu Screen Button 

Languages:

- English

-Español

Thanks for playing!
